Enable optimizations assuming the symmetric heap is always symmetric with regards to virtual address. This may cause applications to abort during shmem_init() if such a symmetric heap can not be created, but will reduce the instruction count for some operations. This optimization also requires that the Portals 4 implementation support BIND_INACCESSIBLE on LEs. This optimization will reduce the overhead of communication calls.
